object.field: Line Detection for Hindi Printed Documents

The aim of this task is accurately localize lines of text by means of bounding boxes, Authors will be asked to localize every line in all test images. All the images in the dataset for task are in the form of JPEG format.

Localization results will be saved in one UTF-8 encoded text file per test image. Authors will be asked to submit a single ZIP file containing all the text files. Result files are named after the name of the test images (e.g. Printed_600_hindi_180.txt). The resultant text files will have the following format with CR/LF line endings.
left_1,top_1,right_1,bottom_1,score_1 left_2,top_2,right_2,bottom_2,score_2 ... left_n,top_n,right_n,bottom_n,score_n
Authors will be asked to include a confidence score for every bounding box. As this score will allow us to calculate an Average Precision (AP) score for the submission.
